meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a naphthalene ring with an amino group attached.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study naphthylamines to learn about their chemical properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled a sample of naphthylamines with care.
meanings.sent3: The naphthylamines in the beaker seemed to be having a tiny party.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, the naphthylamines looked like colorful little beads.
meanings.sent5: In the textbook, the illustration showed the structure of naphthylamines clearly.
